decisions.name: check_if_any_interface_toggle_is_On

rules.name: Interface_toggle_is_On
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 14 AND 20 AND ((15 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR (17 AND (18 OR 19)))) OR 16)
rules.label: Interface toggle is On
